about_the_game:
Welcome to Forest Academy, a picturesque private academy nestled in an astonishing establishment, where friendships are forged, secrets unravel, and an unforgettable summer awaits. In this captivating visual novel, you will embark on a thrilling journey as the main protagonist, Alex, and navigate the delicate balance between friendship, self-discovery, and a mysterious enigma lurking beneath the surface.

Forest Academy, often referred to as a summer camp for its members, becomes the backdrop for a tale of adventure and personal growth. Parents entrust their children to this facility to enjoy their own vacation without distractions or to motivate their children to expand their social horizons. As Alex, your character's gender, determined by your choice at the beginning of the game, will influence the unfolding story and relationships.

Alex is an introverted individual who finds themselves reluctantly sent to Forest Academy by their parents, who hope this experience will coax them out of their shells and foster new connections. It's within the lush, vibrant campus that Alex's journey of self-discovery begins, where they will encounter a diverse cast of characters who have their own dreams, fears, and desires.

As Alex mingles with their peers, the story takes an unexpected turn. A mystery haunts the academy, and an aura of secrecy shrouds the atmosphere. Alex, driven by curiosity and armed with their newfound friendships, embarks on a quest to unravel the enigma before it consumes the tranquility of Forest Academy. The choices you make as Alex will determine the course of the story, impacting not only friendships but also the resolution of the gripping mystery.

Immerse yourself in the vivid world of Forest Academy, where stunning visuals and captivating dialogues bring the characters and their stories to life. Each encounter holds the potential for friendship or enmity, and your decisions will shape the outcomes and reveal the true nature of those around you. Engage in heartfelt conversations, share memorable moments, and delve into the depths of the mystery that threatens to unravel the tranquility of the academy.

Key Features:
  • Play as Alex, the introverted protagonist on a journey of self-discovery.
  • Choose your character's gender, influencing relationships and storylines.
  • Uncover the secrets lurking within the serene Forest Academy.
  • Forge friendships or rivalries with a diverse cast of intriguing characters.
  • Make choices that shape the narrative and impact the resolution of the mystery.
  • Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world with captivating dialogue.
  • You don't want to play by yourself? Don't worry. The game offers online co-op mode where you and your friend can play Alex, the main character, and Charlie, another character added to the story in co-op mode. Both of you can make choices and shape the narrative together.

Embark on an unforgettable summer adventure in "Lost Along The Way," where friendship, self-discovery, and the pursuit of truth intertwine. Will you unmask the hidden secrets before it's too late? The fate of the academy rests in your hands.
